trans-unit.source: Provides a property type to the bind infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性型別提供給繫結基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: It is implemented by activities that contain a property of variable type, where the type can vary depending on other activity settings.
trans-unit.target: 它是由包含變數型別之屬性的活動所實作，其中的型別會視其他活動設定而改變。

trans-unit.source: This interface allows the parent activity to associate two properties and indicate to the bind infrastructure the type to be used in validating the bind.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面允許父活動與兩個屬性產生關聯，並為繫結基礎結構指示驗證繫結時使用的型別。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might have an activity with two properties, `TypeProperty` and `ValueProperty`, where `TypeProperty` specifies a valid type for the value of `ValueProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以讓活動具有 `TypeProperty` 和 `ValueProperty` 等兩個屬性，其中 `TypeProperty` 會指定 `ValueProperty` 之值的有效型別。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the parent activity implements the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在此狀況下，父活動會實作 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider> 介面。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design time services if they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 以便在必要時提供設計階段服務之存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the access type for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之屬性的存取類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性存取層級的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。

trans-unit.source: Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個介面，會直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> to provide access to design-time services if they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 的物件，該提供者可在需要設計階段服務時提供相關存取權。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the property whose name is passed as the <paramref name="propertyName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，其名稱會作為 <paramref name="propertyName" /> 參數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other.
trans-unit.target: 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。
